title: ETF of the Week: CoinShares Bitcoin Mining ETF (WGMI)
description: VettaFi’s Head of Research Todd Rosenbluth discussed the CoinShares Bitcoin Mining ETF (WGMI) on this week’s “ETF of the Week” podcast with Chuck Jaffe of “Money Life.” For more news, information, and strategy, visit the CoinShares Crypto ETF Hub.The post ETF of the Week: CoinShares Bitcoin Mining ETF (WGMI) appeared first on ETF Trends.
